title: Invasion
leftText: Rally your forces and gather with other explorers to defend the Solaris universe and stop the invasion of forces from beyond.
rigthText: More than a hundred planets will become locations for endless battle, and at the end of the event, worthy rewards await you!

title: New Year 2024
leftText: Take part in a raid dedicated to the New Year and receive rewards in the form of achievements and rare resources!
rigthText: Celebrate, have fun, welcome the New Year 2024 in the company of friends in the Solaris universe!

title: Pet?
leftText: Introducing companion pets into the project that will increase your characteristics and relieve you of loneliness in cold space
rigthText: Dogs, cats, and some with tentacles!
